languages.text: {n}Помрачнев, Волк скомкано завершает.{/n} "Возвращение из тьмы было долгим и стоило мне... многого. Когда я вновь ступил в чертоги Клыка, рунные жрецы наделили тело мое оставшимся геносеменем и имплантировали священные органы. Но те испытания были ничтожны в сравнении с пережитым".

traits.locale_text: {n}Помрачнев, Волк скомканно завершает.{/n} "Возвращение из тьмы было долгим и стоило мне... многого. Когда я вновь ступил в чертоги Клыка, рунные жрецы наделили тело мое оставшимся геносеменем и имплантировали священные органы. Но те испытания были ничтожны в сравнении с пережитым".
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}His face darkening, the Wolf continues in a subdued tone,{/n} "My return from the dark was long and cost me... greatly. When I stood in the hall of the Fang once more, the Rune Priests imbued my body with the remaining gene-seed and implanted the necessary organs. But those trials were nothing compared to what I had already endured."
languages.original_text: {n}Помрачнев, Волк скомкано завершает.{/n} "Возвращение из тьмы было долгим и стоило мне... многого. languages.text: {n}他的脸色沉了下来，以低沉的语气继续开了口。{/n}“我花了很长时间，才从黑暗中回来，而且，这让我付出了……巨大的代价。当我再次站在狼牙圣殿的大殿中时，符文牧师将剩余的基因种子注入了我的身体，植入了必须植入的器官。不过，这些考验与我之前忍受过的痛苦相比，完全不值一提。”
languages.original_text: {n}His face darkening, the Wolf continues in a subdued tone,{/n} "My return from the dark was long and cost me... greatly. When I stood in the hall of the Fang once more, the Rune Priests imbued my body with the remaining gene-seed and implanted the necessary organs. But those trials were nothing compared to what I had already endured."

traits.locale_text: {n}他的脸色沉了下来，以低沉的语气继续开了口。{/n}“我花了很长时间，才从黑暗中回来，而且，这让我付出了……巨大的代价。当我再次站在狼牙圣殿的大殿中时，符文牧师将剩余的基因种子注入了我的身体，植入了受祝福的器官。不过，这些考验与我之前忍受过的痛苦相比，完全不值一提。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}El Lobo continúa con gesto sombrío y tono más callado:{/n} «Mi regreso de la oscuridad me costó... mucho. Cuando por fin pude erguirme en los salones del Colmillo otra vez, los Sacerdotes Rúnicos imbuyeron mi cuerpo con la semilla genética restante e implantaron los órganos necesarios. Pero eso no fue nada comparado con lo que ya había superado».
languages.original_text: {n}His face darkening, the Wolf continues in a subdued tone,{/n} "My return from the dark was long and cost me... greatly. When I stood in the hall of the Fang once more, the Rune Priests imbued my body with the remaining gene-seed and implanted the necessary organs. But those trials were nothing compared to what I had already endured."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Lobo continúa con gesto sombrío y tono más callado:{/n} «Mi regreso de la oscuridad me costó... mucho. Cuando por fin pude erguirme en los salones del Colmillo otra vez, los Sacerdotes Rúnicos imbuyeron mi cuerpo con la semilla genética restante e implantaron los órganos benditos. Pero eso no fue nada comparado con lo que ya había superado».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}顔を暗くした狼は、控えめな口調でこう続けた。{/n}「俺の暗闇からの帰還は長く、大きな犠牲を伴うものだった。俺が再び<牙城>の広間に立ったとき、ルーンプリーストたちは俺の体に残りの遺伝種子を埋め込み、必要な器官を移植した。しかし、これらの試練は、俺がすでに耐えてきたことに比べれば、何でもないことだった」
languages.original_text: {n}His face darkening, the Wolf continues in a subdued tone,{/n} "My return from the dark was long and cost me... greatly. When I stood in the hall of the Fang once more, the Rune Priests imbued my body with the remaining gene-seed and implanted the necessary organs. But those trials were nothing compared to what I had already endured."

traits.locale_text: {n}顔を暗くした狼は、控えめな口調でこう続けた。{/n}「俺の暗闇からの帰還は長く、大きな犠牲を伴うものだった。俺が再び<牙城>の広間に立ったとき、ルーンプリーストたちは俺の体に残りの遺伝種子を埋め込み、必要な器官を移植した。しかし、これらの試練は、俺がすでに耐えてきたことに比べれば、何でもないことだった」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Das Gesicht des Wolfs verdunkelt sich und er fährt in gedämpftem Ton fort:{/n} "Meine Rückkehr aus der Dunkelheit war lang und hat mich ... viel gekostet. Als ich wieder in den Hallen des Reißzahns stand, tränkten die Runenpriester meinen Körper mit der verbleibenden Gensaat und implantierten die erforderlichen Organe. Aber diese Prüfungen waren nichts im Vergleich zu dem, was ich bereits ertragen hatte."
languages.original_text: {n}His face darkening, the Wolf continues in a subdued tone,{/n} "My return from the dark was long and cost me... greatly. When I stood in the hall of the Fang once more, the Rune Priests imbued my body with the remaining gene-seed and implanted the necessary organs. But those trials were nothing compared to what I had already endured."

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Gesicht des Wolfs verdunkelt sich und er fährt in gedämpftem Ton fort:{/n} "Meine Rückkehr aus der Dunkelheit war lang und hat mich ... viel gekostet. Als ich wieder in den Hallen des Reißzahns stand, tränkten die Runenpriester meinen Körper mit der verbleibenden Gensaat und implantierten die gesegneten Organe. Aber diese Prüfungen waren nichts im Vergleich zu dem, was ich bereits ertragen hatte."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Alors que son visage s'assombrit, le Space Wolf poursuit à voix basse :{/n} « Mon retour des ténèbres fut long et m'a... beaucoup coûté. Lorsque j'ai retrouvé la salle du Croc, les prêtres des runes ont imprégné mon corps des génogermes restants et m'ont implanté les organes nécessaires. Mais ces épreuves n'étaient rien à côté de ce que j'avais déjà enduré. »
languages.original_text: {n}His face darkening, the Wolf continues in a subdued tone,{/n} "My return from the dark was long and cost me... greatly. When I stood in the hall of the Fang once more, the Rune Priests imbued my body with the remaining gene-seed and implanted the necessary organs. But those trials were nothing compared to what I had already endured."

traits.locale_text: {n}Alors que son visage s'assombrit, le Space Wolf poursuit à voix basse :{/n} « Mon retour des ténèbres fut long et m'a... beaucoup coûté. Lorsque j'ai retrouvé la salle du Croc, les prêtres des runes ont imprégné mon corps du génogerme restant et m'ont implanté les organes bénis. Mais ces épreuves n'étaient rien à côté de ce que j'avais déjà enduré. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}His face darkening, the Wolf continues in a subdued tone,{/n} "My return from the dark was long and cost me... greatly. When I stood in the hall of the Fang once more, the Rune Priests imbued my body with the remaining gene-seed and implanted the necessary organs. But those trials were nothing compared to what I had already endured."

languages.text: {n}Bakışları kararan Kurt, sakin bir ses tonuyla konuşmaya devam ediyor.{/n} "Karanlıktan çıkmam uzun sürdü, bedeli de ağır oldu. Diş salonuna geldiğimde Rün Rahipleri, bedenime kalan gen tohumunu aşılayıp gerekli organları nakletti. Fakat bu imtihanlar, yaşadıklarımın yanında hiçbir şeydi."
languages.original_text: {n}His face darkening, the Wolf continues in a subdued tone,{/n} "My return from the dark was long and cost me... greatly. When I stood in the hall of the Fang once more, the Rune Priests imbued my body with the remaining gene-seed and implanted the necessary organs. But those trials were nothing compared to what I had already endured."

traits.locale_text: {n}Bakışları kararan Kurt, sakin bir ses tonuyla konuşmaya devam ediyor.{/n} "Karanlıktan çıkmam uzun sürdü ve bedeli ağır oldu. Diş salonuna geldiğimde Rün Rahipleri bedenimi geri kalan gen tohumuyla aşıladı ve gerekli organları nakletti. Fakt bu imtihanlar, yaşadıklarımın yanında hiçbir şeydi."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
